lines.text: Miss Webb, I have been to hundreds of houses, countless seances, and I have never yet seen something that can't be explained in rational terms. The people I've met all have one thing in common; pain.
I thought you came to help me.
Miss Webb, I am trying to help you.
You mean to tell me that you see nothing?
I see nothing. But the point is, you do. And if you just give me a few simple details, I intend to prove to you that there's nothing in Edbrook House to be afraid of.
There are spirits in this house. I know you see Arrggghhhh
[clutches throat as though strangled by invisible hands]
